attributes.action: Not Make the Euro Britains Currency Ever!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain Should never join the Euro, please sign below if you feel the same as me.
There are countless arguments with which i could base my feelings on however i cannot be bothered to do this.
Im sure that you like myself feel that Britain should never join the Euro and as such no ammount of factual backing would be needed to get you to sign up anyway. 

So please go right ahead and sign up to reject any move towards joining the Euro.
